_header: Better it is in the way to go
Subjects: precepts, moral; journeys, prognostications concerning; prognostications; glosses; translations
_description: Couplets scattered in text of Bernardus Sylvestris, Experimentaris…

NYPL120.Transcription:
better it is in þe wey to gooThen to bide atome & suffer
                    woo
NYPL120.Note:
Added to right margin by original scribe, as a gloss beside Latin text
                    it translates.
